interactions.trigger_condition: BEK_MIKOLA_1.properties['state'] in ['finished'] and BEK_MIKOLA_1.properties['target'] == '' and Model_00.actions.object_in_rog(item=BEK_MIKOLA_1, geo_area=Model_00.actions.filter_by_type(objects=self.features, obj_type="WAITING_REGION")) != ''

interactions.response_action: Model_00.actions.fox_rabbit(lat1=BEK_MIKOLA_1.properties['lat'], lon1=BEK_MIKOLA_1.properties['lon'], alt1=BEK_MIKOLA_1.properties['alt'], speed1=BEK_MIKOLA_1.properties['speed'], lat2=SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['lat'], lon2=SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['lon'], alt2=SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['alt'], speed2=SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['speed'], course2=SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['course'], dt=100.0) and BEK_MIKOLA_1.properties['geo_path']['geometry']['coordinates'] = BEK_MIKOLA_1.actions.find_path(ship_lat=BEK_MIKOLA_1.properties['lat'], ship_lon=BEK_MIKOLA_1.properties['lon'], target_lat=Model_00.properties['lat'], target_lon=Model_00.properties['lon'], geo_area=Model_00.actions.filter_by_type(objects=self.features, obj_type="RESTRICTED_AREA"))

interactions.trigger_condition: BEK_MIKOLA_1.properties['state'] in ['waiting', 'standing'] and self.iteration_time >=BEK_MIKOLA_1.properties['waiting_time'] and BEK_MIKOLA_1.actions.look_detection(item1=BEK_MIKOLA_1, item2=SHIP_ROGOV_1,  rain=WEATHER.properties['rain_intensive'], frog=WEATHER.properties['frog_intensive'], max_distance=BEK_MIKOLA_1.properties['detection_distance'])

interactions.trigger_condition: BPLA_VT40_1.properties['state'] == 'moving'  and  BPLA_VT40_1.properties['target'] != '' and BPLA_VT40_1.actions.check_destroyed(objects=self.objects,  attacker=BPLA_VT40_1, target=BPLA_VT40_1.properties['target'], min_distance=BPLA_VT40_1.properties['distance_of_defeat'], probability=BPLA_VT40_1.properties['probability'])

interactions.response_action: Model_00.actions.fox_rabbit(lat1=BPLA_VT40_1.properties['lat'], lon1=BPLA_VT40_1.properties['lon'], alt1=BPLA_VT40_1.properties['alt'], speed1=BPLA_VT40_1.properties['speed'], lat2=Model_00.actions.get_object_prop(item=BPLA_VT40_1.properties['target'], prop='lat', objects=self.objects), lon2=Model_00.actions.get_object_prop(item=BPLA_VT40_1.properties['target'], prop='lon', objects=self.objects), alt2=Model_00.actions.get_object_prop(item=BPLA_VT40_1.properties['target'], prop='alt', objects=self.objects), speed2=Model_00.actions.get_object_prop(item=BPLA_VT40_1.properties['target'], prop='speed', objects=self.objects), course2=Model_00.actions.get_object_prop(item=BPLA_VT40_1.properties['target'], prop='course', objects=self.objects), dt=100.0) and BPLA_VT40_1.properties['geo_path']['geometry']['coordinates'] = BPLA_VT40_1.actions.find_path(ship_lat=BPLA_VT40_1.properties['lat'], ship_lon=BPLA_VT40_1.properties['lon'], target_lat=Model_00.properties['lat'], target_lon=Model_00.properties['lon'], geo_area=Model_00.actions.filter_by_type(objects=self.features, obj_type="RESTRICTED_AREA"))

interactions.trigger_condition: BPLA_VT40_1.properties['state'] in ['finished', 'moving'] and BPLA_VT40_1.properties['target'] != '' and self.iteration_time % 1 == 0 and BPLA_VT40_1.actions.detect_enemy(item1=BPLA_VT40_1, objects=self.objects, rain=WEATHER.properties['rain_intensive'], frog=WEATHER.properties['frog_intensive'], max_distance=BPLA_VT40_1.properties['detection_distance'])

properties.name: is_day
properties.title: наличие или отсутствие естественного или искусственного освещения цели

actions.name: Проверка, попадает ли объект в РОЖ
Получение свойства объекта по его id и имени проперти
Алгоритм обнаружения объектов противника на заданном радиусе

simulation_parameters.end_condition: BEK_MIKOLA_1.properties['hull_damage'] + BEK_MIKOLA_2.properties['hull_damage'] + BEK_MIKOLA_3.properties['hull_damage'] + BEK_MIKOLA_4.properties['hull_damage']  + BEK_MIKOLA_5.properties['hull_damage'] == 5  or SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['state'] == 'destroyed'
